Title: WordEditor.  A Word Editor for Windows, and an extended RichTextBox control.
Description: This is a word editor that can be used as a stand alone word processor, or added to an existing project.
HomeWiki:
This project is currently in beta mode, but it is stable, and most of the functions work. It is a full richt text editor, with print controls, a find/replace form, and a very nice format class, that allows formatting of multiple styles in selected text, without overwriting existing formats.

This editor provides a drop down box for selecting the fonts that are installed and usable. Drop down menus for SelectionColor and SelectionBackcolor are also provided.
